description:
Bad Bunny is scheduled to appear at the 2026 Super Bowl.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Bad Bunny says "Fuck ICE" at any point during this event. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

If clips or prerecorded videos are aired where Bad Bunny is speaking, those clips will count toward this market's resolution.

Commercials which are not part of the broadcast of the event itself will not qualify toward this market's resolution.

Any usage of the term regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

AI-generated audio or video will not qualify towards the resolution of this market.

In cases where a potential mention of the term is censored, a consensus of credible reporting will be used to determine whether it was stated.

If this appearance is definitively cancelled by Bad Bunny or NBC, or otherwise is not released by February 9, 2026, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source will be the official broadcast of Super Bowl LX.
